程序包 model

接口 ModelMethod

所有已知实现类:
Model
public interface ModelMethod
The interface ModelMethod. This interface defines the methods for managing user authentication, retrieving and updating recipes, and handling image processing. It also includes methods for user sign-up, login, VIP status check, and various operations related to recipes and ingredients.
作者:
He Chenyi

  • 方法详细资料

    • sign

      boolean sign(String name, String password)
      Signs up a new user with the given name and password.
      参数:
      name - the name of the user
      password - the password of the user
      返回:
      true if the sign-up was successful, false otherwise

    • login

      boolean login(String name, String password)
      Logs in a user with the given name and password.
      参数:
      name - the name of the user
      password - the password of the user
      返回:
      true if the login was successful, false otherwise

    • userIsVip

      boolean userIsVip(String userName)
      Checks if the user with the given name is a VIP.
      参数:
      userName - the name of the user
      返回:
      true if the user is a VIP, false otherwise

    • updateImageNames

      List<String> updateImageNames(String recipeName)
      Updates and retrieves the image names associated with the given recipe name.
      参数:
      recipeName - the name of the recipe
      返回:
      a list of image names associated with the recipe

    • updateImageUrls

      HashMap<Integer,String> updateImageUrls(String recipeName)
      Updates and retrieves the image URLs associated with the given recipe name.
      参数:
      recipeName - the name of the recipe
      返回:
      a hash map with image IDs as keys and image URLs as values

    • getRecipeByID

      Recipe getRecipeByID(Integer id)
      Retrieves a recipe by its ID.
      参数:
      id - the ID of the recipe
      返回:
      the recipe with the specified ID

    • getRecipePreparationSteps

      List<PreparationStep> getRecipePreparationSteps(Integer id)
      Retrieves the preparation steps for a recipe by its ID.
      参数:
      id - the ID of the recipe
      返回:
      a list of preparation steps for the recipe

    • addRecipe

      Integer addRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Adds a new recipe to the database.
      参数:
      recipe - the recipe to be added
      返回:
      the ID of the newly added recipe

    • addRecipeIngredient

      void addRecipeIngredient(RecipeIngredient recipeIngredient)
      Adds a new ingredient for a recipe to the database.
      参数:
      recipeIngredient - the ingredient to be added

    • updateRecipeIngredient

      void updateRecipeIngredient(Integer recipeID, List<RecipeIngredient> recipeIngredients)
      Updates the ingredients of a recipe with the given ID.
      参数:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe
      recipeIngredients - the list of ingredients to update

    • getAllRecipes

      List<Recipe> getAllRecipes()
      Retrieves all recipes from the database.
      返回:
      a list of all recipes

    • duplicateImage

      Path duplicateImage(String imageURL)
      Duplicates an image from the given URL and returns the path to the duplicated image.
      参数:
      imageURL - the URL of the image to duplicate
      返回:
      the path to the duplicated image

    • serveNumberIsInteger

      boolean serveNumberIsInteger(String str)
      Checks if a given string represents an integer.
      参数:
      str - the string to check
      返回:
      true if the string is an integer, false otherwise

    • updateIngredientByServeNumber

      List<RecipeIngredient> updateIngredientByServeNumber(Integer id, String serveNumber)
      Updates the ingredients of a recipe based on the number of servings.
      参数:
      id - the ID of the recipe
      serveNumber - the number of servings to update the ingredients for
      返回:
      a list of updated ingredients based on the number of servings

    • getIngredientByID

      List<RecipeIngredient> getIngredientByID(Integer id)
      Retrieves the ingredients of a recipe by its ID.
      参数:
      id - the ID of the recipe
      返回:
      a list of ingredients for the recipe

    • setVIP

      void setVIP(String username)
      Sets a user as VIP based on their username.
      参数:
      username - the username of the user to set as VIP

    • updateRecipe

      void updateRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Updates an existing recipe in the database.
      参数:
      recipe - the recipe with updated information

    • addRecipePreparationStep

      void addRecipePreparationStep(PreparationStep preparationStep)
      Adds a new preparation step for a recipe to the database.
      参数:
      preparationStep - the preparation step to be added

    • updateRecipePreparationStep

      void updateRecipePreparationStep(Integer recipeID, List<PreparationStep> preparationSteps)
      Updates the preparation steps of a recipe with the given ID.
      参数:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe
      preparationSteps - the list of preparation steps to update

    • deleteRecipe

      void deleteRecipe(Integer recipeID)
      Deletes a recipe from the database based on its ID.
      参数:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe to delete

    • validateRecipe

      boolean validateRecipe(String recipeName, String cookingTime, String preparationTime, String recipeImage)
      Validates the given recipe details.
      参数:
      recipeName - the name of the recipe
      cookingTime - the cooking time of the recipe
      preparationTime - the preparation time of the recipe
      recipeImage - the image associated with the recipe
      返回:
      true if the recipe details are valid, false otherwise

    • validateRecipeIngredient

      boolean validateRecipeIngredient(String recipeName, Float quantity, String unit)
      Validates the given recipe ingredient details.
      参数:
      recipeName - the name of the recipe
      quantity - the quantity of the ingredient
      unit - the unit of the ingredient
      返回:
      true if the recipe ingredient details are valid, false otherwise
